item.title: 10 Best Thunderbolts* Quotes
item.description: Marvel's Thunderbolts* features some truly great quotes and one-liners, joining some of the best (and funniest) lines in the MCU at large.

item.title: Why Michael Bay Didn't Direct Bad Boys 4
item.description: Michael Bay chose not to return for Bad Boys 4, and here is why he didn't come back and why it still turned out okay.

item.title: Melissa McCarthy & Jason Statham's Hit Action Comedy With 95% RT Score Gets Encouraging Sequel Update
item.description: Paul Feig is optimistic about whether he'd be open to returning to the world of his hit 2015 comedy film starring Melissa McCarthy and Jason Statham.
